reviewText: I thought I hadn't seen Wolf Creek before, and then when I watched it I was pleasantly surprised that I had seen it. LOL Good dvd mix up.

If I would have read the reviews, I would have seen that these are not presented in a wide screen format. I didn't notice at first because Wolf Creek was 16:9 and I watched it first. I didn't realize the other 2 were NOT wide screen until it was too late to return. BUYER BEWARE!!!!
I actually bought this for Hannibal Rising and thought I would give the other two movies, which I had never seen before, a chance. They were okay but I really like Hannibal Rising.
Great job thanks! Would order from this seller anytime again.
Save your money. HANNIBAL RISING and PULSE are 4:3 instead of 2,35:1, which means that nearly half of the image is missing. Somebody should have mentioned that.
